mdRecord.dcterms:title: Members of the French and British Missions at Mount Vernon, April 29, 1917
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Harris & Ewing
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of members of the French and British Missions on the east lawn. Secretary of the Navy Josephus Daniels standing second from the left and Marshal Joffre is in the center in profile (dark uniform). The photographer's name [Harris & Ewing] is embossed in the bottom right corner. Two holes and grommets are punched at left edge.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
